agent clear.description: Clear all agent state and stop execution, restoring consultant states if any were saved.

agent status.description: Shows current agent status including history summary.

api models.description: Lists all available AI models across configured providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc).

api status.description: Show API call count and limit.

api switch.description: Switches the main AI provider for the session (requires progenitor status) and can optionally set a new model.

delay.description: Shows the current delay in seconds, or sets the delay between interaction cycles (0-60).

prepare_shutdown.description: Gracefully stop actions and save state.

disable voice.description: Disables voice output for AI responses.

dirtoff.description: Disables the 'dirt' persona, returning the AI to its default response style.

dirton.description: Enables the 'dirt' persona, instructing the AI to respond in a more informal, edgy, and unpolished style.

enable voice.description: Enables voice output for AI responses using text-to-speech.

log level.description: Sets the verbosity level for system logging output.

start advisory.description: Loads and activates the 'advisory' action module for inter-addon communication.

start auth.description: Loads and activates the 'auth' module, which manages user accounts, session tokens, and request authentication.

start aware.description: Loads and activates the 'aware' module, which injects contextual information about system features into prompts based on user input.

start back.description: Activates the 'back' module, allowing the user to make the AI repeat its previous response by typing the command 'back'.

start block.description: Activates the word blocking module, which automatically censors a predefined list of words in all AI-generated responses.

start common.description: Activates common system utilities and shared functionality used by multiple actions.

start controls.description: Activates the UI control module, which allows the AI to send commands (e.g., '[CONTROL: execute_js ...]') to manipulate the user interface.

start core.description: Activates the core system controller, which enables the AI to execute commands and manage other actions using special tags like '[start/stop]' and '[command]'.

start dataflow.description: Activates the dataflow module, enabling commands to save, get, and snapshot data from files.

start dirt.description: Activates the 'dirt' persona module, which can modify AI responses to be more informal and edgy using the 'dirton' and 'dirtoff' commands.

start emails.description: Activates the email module and initializes the email client.

start emotions.description: Loads and activates the 'emotions' action module for tracking conversation emotional tone.

start filter.description: Loads and activates the 'filter' action module to suppress non-essential system messages.

start flooring.description: Activates the Professional Floor Covering Calculator v3.0 with expert estimation, T-seam optimization, visual cut maps, and comprehensive waste analysis.

start focus.description: Loads and activates the 'focus' action module for perturbation of user input.

start health.description: A compound command to start both health_observer_ss1 and health_analyzer_ss2.

start health_analyzer_ss2.description: Starts the SS2 Insight Engine that analyzes patterns from SS1's event stream.

start health_observer_ss1.description: Starts the SS1 Universal Observer that monitors all system events.

start jjk.description: Activates the security monitoring and control system. Requires prior successful authentication via 'jjk auth'.

start karma.description: Loads and activates the 'karma' action module for tracking AI behavior score.

start log_reader.description: Activates the log reader module, allowing the user and AI to search the conversation history.

start lore.description: Activates the world-building data capture system.

start lvl3.description: Loads and activates the 'lvl3' action module.

start memory.description: Loads and activates the 'memory' action module for persistent fact and conversation storage.

start newfilter.description: Loads and activates the 'newfilter' action module that shows only user and AI messages.

start ok.description: Loads and activates the 'ok' action module.

start persona.description: Loads and activates the 'persona' action module.

start placeholder_action.description: Loads and activates the ultimate reference implementation addon demonstrating ALL AGS best practices and patterns.

start principles.description: Loads and activates the 'principles' action module for monitoring ME PRINCIPLES violations.

start prompts.description: Activates the prompt management module (Smart Whiteboard).

start recent_turns.description: Loads and activates the 'recent_turns' action module.

start resend.description: Loads and activates the 'resend' action module that allows resending the last user prompt.

start sandbox.description: Loads and activates the 'sandbox' action module.

start sms.description: Activates the SMS module and initializes the Twilio client.

start think_mode.description: Activates the think mode module that allows multi-turn thinking before final response.

start update.description: Loads and activates the 'update' action module.

start v-agent.description: Starts the goal-oriented agent system for executing complex multi-step tasks.

start voice.description: Loads and activates the 'voice' action module.

start web_input.description: Activates the web input module, enabling the system to read user messages from a file and write responses to another file.

start wiki_action.description: Activates the Wikipedia integration module, enabling article search and access features.

start x.description: Loads and activates the 'x' action module.

start youtube_action.description: Activates the YouTube integration module, enabling video search and playback features.

stop advisory.description: Deactivates and stops the 'advisory' action module.

stop auth.description: Deactivates the 'auth' module and saves the current state of all users, tokens, and configurations.

stop aware.description: Deactivates the 'aware' module, stopping it from injecting contextual awareness information.

stop back.description: Deactivates the 'back' module, disabling the command that makes the AI repeat its last message.

stop block.description: Deactivates the word blocking module, stopping all censorship of the AI's responses.

stop controls.description: Deactivates the UI control module, preventing the AI from sending commands to the user interface.

stop core.description: Deactivates the core system controller, preventing the AI from being able to execute system commands or manage other actions.

stop dataflow.description: Deactivates the dataflow module, disabling file read/write capabilities.

stop dirt.description: Deactivates the 'dirt' persona module, restoring the AI to its standard response style and disabling the 'dirton'/'dirtoff' commands.

stop emails.description: Deactivates and stops the 'emails' action module.

stop emotions.description: Deactivates and stops the 'emotions' action module.

stop filter.description: Deactivates and stops the 'filter' action module.

stop flooring.description: Deactivates the professional floor covering calculator v3.0, saving all configuration and state.

stop focus.description: Deactivates and stops the 'focus' action module.

stop health_analyzer_ss2.description: Stops the SS2 Insight Engine pattern analysis.

stop health_observer_ss1.description: Stops the SS1 Universal Observer event monitoring.

stop jjk.description: Deactivates security monitoring but maintains authentication and Progenitor status if currently held.

stop karma.description: Deactivates and stops the 'karma' action module.

stop log_reader.description: Deactivates the log reader module, disabling the ability to search conversation history.

stop lore.description: Deactivates the lore capture system and performs a final save of the world data.

stop lvl3.description: Deactivates and stops the 'lvl3' action module.

stop memory.description: Deactivates and stops the 'memory' action module.

stop newfilter.description: Deactivates and stops the 'newfilter' action module.

stop ok.description: Deactivates and stops the 'ok' action module.

stop persona.description: Deactivates and stops the 'persona' action module.

stop placeholder_action.description: Deactivates the placeholder reference implementation addon and saves all state/configuration.

stop principles.description: Deactivates and stops the 'principles' action module.

stop prompts.description: Deactivates the prompt management module and saves its state.

stop recent_turns.description: Deactivates and stops the 'recent_turns' action module.

stop resend.description: Deactivates and stops the 'resend' action module.

stop sandbox.description: Deactivates and stops the 'sandbox' action module.

stop sms.description: Deactivates and stops the 'sms' action module.

stop update.description: Deactivates and stops the 'update' action module.

stop v-agent.description: Stops the goal-oriented agent system and restores consultant states.

stop voice.description: Deactivates and stops the 'voice' action module.

stop web_input.description: Deactivates the web input module, stopping the system from monitoring its designated input/output files.

stop wiki_action.description: Deactivates the Wikipedia integration module, disabling article search and access.

stop x.description: Deactivates and stops the 'x' action module.

stop youtube_action.description: Deactivates the YouTube integration module, disabling video search and playback.

turn voice off.description: Temporarily disables voice output for the current session.

turn voice on.description: Temporarily enables voice output for the current session.

model.description: Shows the current AI model being used or switches to a different model.

addons off.description: Disables all consultant AIs (addon_ai through addon_ai4) at once.

addons status.description: Shows a summary of the current enabled/disabled status of all consultant AIs.

advisory status.description: Displays the complete current status and configuration of the advisory system, including a list of active advisories.

auth create.description: Creates a new user with a specified username, password, and optional role.

auth debug.description: Displays internal state variables and file status for troubleshooting the auth module.

auth disable.description: Disables a specified user account, preventing them from logging in.

auth enable.description: Re-enables a disabled user account, allowing them to log in again.

auth reset.description: Resets the password for a specified user account.

auth status.description: Displays the current status of the authentication module, including its mode, total users, and active sessions.

auth users.description: Lists all registered users along with their role, status, and last login time.

back.description: Makes the AI repeat its previous response. This command is enabled when the 'back' action module is running.

block add.description: Adds a specified word to the censor list, causing it to be replaced with '[CENSORED]' in all future AI responses.

block list.description: Displays the current list of all words that are being censored in the AI's responses.

block reload.description: Reloads the censor list from the 'block.txt' file, updating the active list with any changes made directly to the file.

block remove.description: Removes a specified word from the censor list, allowing it to appear normally in future AI responses.

data get.description: Load file content for next AI message.

data snapshot.description: Ask AI to summarize conversation and save it.

data status.description: Show pending data and saved files.

email config.description: Configures the sender's email address and password/app-password.

email help.description: Shows a detailed list of all email commands and setup instructions.

email send.description: Sends an email to a specified recipient with a subject and body.

email servers.description: Lists all the configured SMTP servers the module will attempt to use.

email status.description: Checks if the email module is active and if credentials are configured.

email test.description: Sends a test email to the configured sender address to verify the setup.

emotions get current.description: Returns current detected emotions as JSON data for agent use.

emotions get history.description: Returns recent emotion history as JSON data for agent use.

emotions karma status.description: Displays the karma integration status including: Whether karma module is available, if karma suggestions are enabled, current check interval (every N turns), current turn counter progress, emotion score threshold for suggestions, and maximum suggestion limits.

emotions reset.description: Resets emotion tracking state and clears the emotions history file.

emotions status.description: Displays the current detected conversation emotions.

flooring calculate.description: Calculates professional carpet requirements with multiple layout options, visual cut maps, and waste analysis. Supports various input formats including feet, inches, and mixed units.

flooring help.description: Displays comprehensive help for the v3.0 professional flooring calculator including all commands and configuration options.

flooring reset.description: Resets all flooring configuration settings to their professionally recommended defaults.

flooring set.description: Modifies flooring calculator configuration such as seam_preference (optimized/t-seam_saver/educational), rounding_mode (safe/exact), and seam_allowance_inches.

flooring status.description: Shows a detailed status report including the v3.0 addon's current configuration and session statistics.

focus add emotion.description: Adds a new word to the emotional markers list for prompt perturbation.

focus add expletive.description: Adds a new word to the mild expletives list (requires expletives to be enabled).

focus config.description: Displays detailed configuration report including all features, probabilities, and triggers.

focus log off.description: Disables logging of perturbation events to the focus_log.txt file.

focus log on.description: Enables logging of perturbation events to the focus_log.txt file.

focus reset.description: Resets all configuration and statistics to defaults (creates backup first).

focus set emotions off.description: Disables emotional marker injection in prompt perturbations.

focus set emotions on.description: Enables emotional marker injection in prompt perturbations.

focus set expletives off.description: Disables mild expletive injection in prompt perturbations.

focus set expletives on.description: Enables mild expletive injection in prompt perturbations (use with caution).

focus set probability.description: Sets the global probability for applying perturbations (0.0 to 1.0).

focus set typos off.description: Disables typo injection in prompt perturbations.

focus set typos on.description: Enables typo injection in prompt perturbations.

focus status.description: Displays current status including active features, statistics, and recent perturbations.

jjk audit off.description: Disables the JJK security audit log. Requires active Progenitor status to execute.

jjk audit on.description: Enables the JJK security audit log, recording all high-privilege actions.

jjk audit show.description: Displays the most recent entries from the JJK security audit log.

jjk auth.description: Authenticates the user with a password, granting Progenitor status and enabling the use of high-privilege commands.

jjk backup.description: Creates a manual, timestamped backup of critical JJK configurations and system state. Requires Progenitor status.

jjk help.description: Shows a detailed list of all JJK security commands and their functions.

jjk is_progenitor.description: Checks and confirms if Progenitor status is currently active, which is required for critical system operations.

jjk override.description: Sets or unsets a specified system override flag. Requires Progenitor status for execution.

jjk progenitor.description: Confirms Progenitor status. This command is typically redundant as successful auth grants this status automatically.

jjk revoke.description: Manually revokes active Progenitor status, immediately disabling access to all protected commands.

jjk status.description: Displays the complete current status of the JJK security system, including Progenitor status and audit logging settings.

karma history.description: Displays a list of the last 10 karma changes, including the amount, reason, and resulting score.

karma jjk_reset.description: Resets the AI's karma score to 0 and clears all related states. Requires JJK Progenitor status.

karma set_modifier negative.description: Sets a multiplier for negative karma changes (0.0-2.0). Requires JJK Progenitor status.

karma status.description: Shows the AI's current karma score, its tier (e.g., Optimal, Critical), session changes, and a summary of recent changes.

log recent.description: Get last n log entries (default 5, max 20).

lore export.description: Saves the entire captured world database to a human-readable JSON file.

lore find.description: Searches the entire world database for a specific term using fuzzy matching.

lore help.description: Provides a list of available commands for the lore module.

lore list.description: Lists all captured entries within a specified category or lists all available categories if none is specified.

lore status.description: Displays statistics about the captured world data, including the total number of entries and recent detections.

memory auto off.description: Disables automatic memory enhancement based on context.

memory auto on.description: Enables automatic memory enhancement based on context.

memory clear all.description: Deletes all stored memory data including facts, conversations, and preferences.

memory clear pending.description: Clears any pending memory content waiting to be injected.

memory delete conversation.description: Deletes a stored conversation summary by ID.

memory delete fact.description: Deletes a stored fact using format: category|key.

memory get fact.description: Loads a specific fact for injection into the next AI message using format: category|key.

memory help.description: Shows detailed help for all memory commands.

memory list.description: Loads all memories (both facts and conversations) for next AI message.

memory list conversations.description: Loads all conversation summaries for injection into the next AI message.

memory list facts.description: Loads all stored facts for injection into the next AI message.

memory search.description: Searches for relevant memories based on keywords.

memory store conversation.description: Stores a conversation summary using format: id|summary|topic1,topic2,...

memory store fact.description: Stores a fact in memory using format: category|key|value.

persona clear.description: Clears the active persona and reverts to default AI behavior.

persona create.description: Creates a new persona using format: Name Description | System Prompt.

persona delete.description: Deletes a user-created persona by name (cannot delete default personas).

persona info.description: Displays detailed information about a specific persona including its system prompt.

persona list.description: Shows all available personas and indicates which one is currently active.

persona use.description: Activates a persona and clears conversation history to apply the new style immediately.

placeholder antipattern.description: Educational command that displays common anti-patterns to avoid when developing addons, with explanations of why they're harmful.

placeholder compliance.description: Checks if a specified addon follows AGS best practices and patterns. Provides a detailed compliance report.

placeholder demo.description: Demonstrates the delayed injection pattern by queuing text that will be injected into your next AI prompt.

placeholder help.description: Shows comprehensive help for the placeholder addon including all commands, configuration keys, integration targets, and test features.

placeholder integrate.description: Tests integration with other system components (advisory, emotions, memory, jjk, consultant, agent_context).

placeholder multi_step_demo.description: Starts a multi-turn operation demo that simulates a long-running stateful task. Returns an operation ID for completion.

placeholder multi_step_result.description: Completes a multi-turn operation started by multi_step_demo and returns the result. Requires the operation ID.

placeholder set.description: Modifies configuration values. Supports auto_inject (on/off), verbose (on/off), threshold (number), security (on/off), and integration toggles.

placeholder status.description: Displays detailed status report including version, configuration, integration features, runtime statistics, command history, and system integration status.

placeholder test.description: Runs tests on specific features (commands, state, errors, security, silent_api, integration) or 'all' for comprehensive testing.

principles check.description: Check a specific text for principle violations and display detected violations with severity scores.

principles coverage.description: Display current coverage setting showing how many principles are being monitored.

principles coverage all.description: Set coverage to monitor ALL principles regardless of priority level.

principles coverage critical.description: Set coverage to monitor only critical principles (Priority 7 or higher).

principles coverage legacy4.description: Set coverage to monitor only the original 4 principles (P000, P000A, P002, P018).

principles coverage top10.description: Set coverage to monitor the top 10 highest priority principles.

principles help.description: Display help and usage information for all principle monitoring commands.

principles karma status.description: Shows karma integration details including: Whether karma module is available, if karma integration is enabled, turns since last karma check, number of violations tracked since last check, and a list of recent violations with severity scores.

principles list.description: Show all principles currently being monitored, sorted by priority.

principles mode.description: Set the principle detection mode to either 'real-time' (pattern matching) or 'addon-ai' (AI evaluation).

principles mode addon-ai.description: Set principle detection to use addon AI for evaluation instead of pattern matching.

principles mode real-time.description: Set principle detection to use real-time pattern matching and keyword detection.

principles report.description: Generate a comprehensive report of principle violations including statistics and recent violations.

principles stats.description: Display statistics on principle violations including total violations and violations by principle ID.

principles toggle.description: Enable or disable principle violation monitoring.

prompt active.description: Displays the name of the currently active persistent user prompt.

prompt clear.description: Deactivates the current user prompt, returning to the default behavior.

prompt help.description: Displays detailed help text for all prompt-related commands.

prompt persist.description: Toggles whether the active prompt persists for multiple turns or is cleared after one use.

prompt set.description: Creates a new prompt or updates an existing one with new content.

prompt show.description: Displays the full text content of a specified prompt.

prompt status.description: Shows a full status report, including the active prompt, its settings, and any active bulletins from other modules.

prompt ttl.description: Sets a 'Time To Live' for the active prompt, causing it to expire after a set number of turns.

recent.description: Shows all saved conversation turns from the rolling history.

recent clear.description: Clears all saved conversation turn history.

recent help.description: Displays help and usage information for all recent turns commands.

recent max.description: Sets the maximum number of conversation turns to keep in history (1-100).

recent show.description: Shows all saved conversation turns, or specify a number to show last N turns.

recent status.description: Displays current configuration including turns in history, max turns, and settings.

reprompt.description: Re-executes the last user prompt with cleared AI memory context, providing a fresh response.

resend.description: Re-sends the last user prompt to the AI without clearing context, maintaining conversation continuity.

sms help.description: Displays a help message with command usage and examples.

sms send.description: Sends a text message to a specified phone number (which must be in E.164 format).

sms status.description: Checks if the SMS module is active and if the Twilio client is ready.

ss1 report.description: Generates a real-time status report from the SS1 Universal Observer, including runtime, event counts, and active patterns.

ss1 set_idle_threshold.description: Sets the idle threshold in seconds (10-600) for the SS1 observer to determine when the system is idle.

ss2 query_archive.description: Queries the long-term Wisdom Archive for retired patterns matching a specific term.

ss2 report.description: Generates a status report from the SS2 Insight Engine, showing the most significant learned patterns (trees).

think.description: Use think mode with default turns for next response.

wiki auto.description: Toggles the automatic suggestion of relevant Wikipedia articles based on conversation context.

wiki config.description: Configures settings for the Wikipedia module, such as the maximum number of search results to store or the length of search history.

wiki config history.description: Sets the length of Wikipedia search history to remember.

wiki config results.description: Sets the maximum number of Wikipedia search results to store.

wiki list.description: Displays a numbered list of the most recent Wikipedia articles found in searches.

wiki open.description: Opens a specific Wikipedia article from the recent list in the default web browser using its index.

wiki search.description: Searches Wikipedia for articles matching a given query and lists the results.

wikipedia auto.description: Toggles the automatic suggestion of relevant Wikipedia articles based on conversation context.

wikipedia config.description: Configures settings for the Wikipedia module, such as the maximum number of search results to store or the length of search history.

wikipedia config history.description: Sets the length of Wikipedia search history to remember.

wikipedia config results.description: Sets the maximum number of Wikipedia search results to store.

wikipedia list.description: Displays a numbered list of the most recent Wikipedia articles found in searches.

wikipedia open.description: Opens a specific Wikipedia article from the recent list in the default web browser using its index.

wikipedia search.description: Searches Wikipedia for articles matching a given query and lists the results.

youtube auto.description: Toggles the automatic suggestion of relevant YouTube videos based on conversation context.

youtube config.description: Configures settings for the YouTube module, such as the maximum number of search results to store or the length of search history.

youtube config history.description: Sets maximum search history to remember

youtube config results.description: Sets maximum number of results to keep

youtube list.description: Displays a numbered list of the most recent YouTube videos found in searches.

youtube open.description: Opens a specific YouTube video from the recent list in the default web browser using its index.

youtube search.description: Searches YouTube for videos matching a given query and lists the results.

youtube setkey.description: Sets the API key required for using the YouTube search functionality.

goal:.description: Sets a new goal for the agent to work on.
